item.title: Zen to Done: The Next Challenges
item.description: Several weeks ago, I posted about Leo Babauta’s Zen to Done method for Getting Things Done. I apologize for not keeping up my blogging on my progress. But one habit at a time. Habit One: Capturing Everything More than a month later, I can proudly say I’ve mastered the first step in the program. I still record everything on Jott, either on the web or by voice messaging Jott. I’ve been consistent with the exception of three days at the beginning of December.
